questions.question: Question is, if you were able to ask an alien some questions, what would they be?
How do we harness the energy of a sun or multiple suns or all of the suns in our galaxy?
I guess to put it simply, how do you hold on to hope and optimism?
The question is, what is something you changed your opinion about in the past few years?
What does that do in terms of the things you might be able to build?
What was the darkest time in your life and what did your road to recovery look like?
